document.full_text: nolan smith had 20 points and fifth-ranked duke ended no. 6 north carolina's run of big comebacks at the atlantic coast conference tournament, beating the tar heels 75-58 in sunday's final in greensboro, n.c.
document.title: men's roundup: duke adds another title to packed trophy case
lines_and_colors: nolan smith had 20 points and fifth-ranked duke ended no. 6 north carolina's run of big comebacks at the atlantic coast conference tournament, beating the tar heels 75-58 in sunday's final in greensboro, n.c.
